TopicTitle: How can I add buttons to a custom part?

Articles.Content:
How can I add Buttons to my custom part? (Example: EVA out of command capsule, activating any science Experiment, deploying drills) I figured out that it must be something in the partModule Code but I can't figure it out.

(Also how can I disable the Editor spellcheck?)
Look for [KSPEvent(...)] in the source of some other module.
